overview:
Tejash Unadkat brings years of new product and business experience to Fatminds. He has worked at Adobe launching new businesses, at PayPal launching new products, and at Vignette (formerly Epicentric) launching new software.

He holds an MBA from the Kellogg School of Management and a BS in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science from the University of California at Berkeley. He is the cofounder of the South Asian Professional Association of San Francisco and also serves on the Board of Directors at the International House at Berkeley. Go Bears!

The next degree he wants to pursue is a PhD in Organizational Behavior. He wants to dig into the human psyche on a full time basis.
